about_the_game:
After the release of The Territory of Egg, we received a lot of feedbacks. In The Territory of Egg 2, I have incorporated this feedback to upgrade the gameplay, further enhancing the strategic elements and build diversity. Additionally, I have introduced powerful Heroic Eggs, more new skills, and new enemies. For the visual effects, I partnered with a collaborator to fully improve the art, making the gaming experience more comfortable. In terms of content, the The Territory of Egg 2 features even more new levels than the Generation 1, with each level offering multiple difficulty modes for players to challenge. I hope these changes will provide a better experience, and I look forward to receiving more suggestions and feedback from you.



In addition to building the 6 basic eggs and 20 advanced eggs from the original "The Territory of Egg", you can also awaken 6 types of Heroic eggs with different skill traits on the map. Use the powerful forces of these heroic eggs to fortify your frontlines!




Each basic egg can choose from 4 evolutionary routes. Select different routes based on terrain and monsters' weakness to challenge more threatening enemies.




Each advanced egg can choose to learn 3 out of 6 skills, while each Heroic egg can choose to learn 4 out of 8 skills. Select from a variety of skill combinations to build your own lineup!




Resources collected during levels will be used to upgrade your tech tree, granting you greater power in the battles. As the battle progresses, the eggs will grow stronger.




Unlock challenge modes as you progress through waves of battles, facing different challenges. Carve out a territory for the Egg Kingdom in the dark forest!

short_description: The Territory of Egg 2 is an unique tower defense indie game. Place Egg Towers, choose evolution branches, combine skills and build defenses. The souls of Heroic Eggs await your awakening! Explore and gather resources in the dark forest, unlock the technology tree, and defeat even stronger enemies!
